title: Sunlite 82061-SU LED Decorative Curved Wall Sconce Fixture, 10 Watts, 600 Lumen, Brushed Nickel Finish, Dimmable, Indoor Lighting, ETL Listed, 1 Light, 3000K Warm White
features: LED TECHNOLOGY - Each fixture has energy saving LEDs built-in that never need replacing. They emit a dimmable 3000K Warm White light at 600 lumen but only use 10 watts of electricity. Estimated yearly energy cost of $1.20 based on 3 hours/day $0. 11/kWh.

CONTEMPORARY DESIGN - The brushed nickel frame holds a curved opaque lens that is open to allow light to wash the wall above and below. The design will add a contemporary touch to any home or business.
MAINTENANCE FREE - With a life span of up to 30,000 hours this fixture is designed for years or reliable and maintenance-free service with no bulbs to replace.

INDOOR USE - Suitable for residential and commercial applications. Ideal for hallways, entry ways, living rooms, dining rooms, bedrooms, office spaces, bathrooms, powder rooms and more. UL Listed for Damp Location installation.
EASY TO INSTALL - This sconce is easy to install on any junction box. Mounting hardware, screws, wire nuts and installation instructions are included.
description: This Sunlite single light LED wall sconce will add a contemporary touch to any home or business. The brushed nickel frame holds a curved opaque lens that is open to allow light to wash the wall above and below. This fixture emits a dimmable 3000K warm white light at 600 lumen. Estimated yearly energy cost of 1.2 based on 3 hours/day $0. 11/kWh. Designed for indoor use and UL Listed for damp location installation. With built-in LEDs this attractive fixture will provide up to 30, 000 hours of reliable and maintenance free service. Mounting hardware, screws, wire nuts and installation instructions are included.
